lead_paragraph: When record Olympic champion Michael Phelps and the king of sprinting Usain Bolt resume their hunt for world records and gold medals at the Rio de Janeiro Olympics next month they will not be the only big stories in town.

headline.print_headline: Refugees Primed to Pump Up Games Feel-Good Factor
headline.main: Refugees Primed to Pump Up Games Feel-Good Factor

snippet: When record Olympic champion Michael Phelps and the king of sprinting Usain Bolt resume their hunt for world records and gold medals at the Rio de Janeiro Olympics next month they will not be the only big stories in town....
